actions.detail: Until the end of the target’s next turn, they first take 2 heat whenever they attack.
actions.name: Shrike Code

actions.detail: Choose yourself or an allied character: your systems relay blurred, illusory images over their actual silhouette. Your target treats you, or the character you chose, as Invisible until the end of their next turn.
actions.name: Mirage

system.description: “Somehow it got inside my cockpit. There were hands – cold hands – around my neck, fingers in my mouth, worming under my hardsuit. No one else could have been in there with me and yet, someone was. I couldn't even scream, it held my tongue in a fist and it squeezed, and it whispered its name to me, and it said nothing I could understand. I have never felt more alone – it was just me and… it. Alone in the universe, forever.”
